classes.name: URL
classes.description: Represents a Uniform Resource Locator, a pointer to a resource on the World Wide Web.

params.name: spec
params.description: The String to parse as a URL

constructors.description: Creates a URL object from the String representation.

params.name: file
params.description: The file path on the host

constructors.description: Creates a URL object from the specified protocol, host, port number, and file.

params.name: file
params.description: The file path on the host

constructors.description: Creates a URL from the specified protocol name, host name, and file name. Uses the default port for the protocol.

params.name: context
params.description: The context in which to parse the spec

params.name: spec
params.description: The String to parse as a URL

constructors.description: Creates a URL by parsing the spec within the specified context.

methods.name: openConnection

returns.description: A URLConnection linking to the URL

methods.description: Returns a URLConnection instance that represents a connection to the remote object referred to by the URL.

methods.name: openStream

returns.description: An input stream for reading from the URL connection

methods.description: Opens a connection to this URL and returns an InputStream for reading from that connection.

methods.name: getProtocol

returns.description: The protocol name of this URL

methods.description: Gets the protocol name of this URL (e.g., http, https, ftp).

methods.name: getHost

returns.description: The host name of this URL

methods.description: Gets the host name of this URL.

methods.name: getPort

returns.description: The port number, or -1 if not set

methods.description: Gets the port number of this URL. Returns -1 if the port is not set.

methods.name: getDefaultPort

returns.description: The default port number for the protocol

methods.description: Gets the default port number of the protocol associated with this URL.

methods.name: getPath

returns.description: The path part of this URL

methods.description: Gets the path part of this URL.

methods.name: getQuery

returns.description: The query part of this URL, or null

methods.description: Gets the query part of this URL.

methods.name: getFile

returns.description: The file name of this URL (path + query)

methods.description: Gets the file name of this URL, which includes the path and query components.

methods.name: getRef

returns.description: The anchor (fragment) of this URL, or null

methods.description: Gets the anchor (also known as the fragment or reference) of this URL.

methods.name: getUserInfo

returns.description: The userInfo part of this URL, or null

methods.description: Gets the userInfo part of this URL.

methods.name: getAuthority

returns.description: The authority part of this URL

methods.description: Gets the authority part of this URL.

methods.name: toExternalForm

returns.description: A string representation of this URL

methods.description: Constructs a string representation of this URL.

methods.name: toURI

returns.description: A URI equivalent to this URL

methods.description: Returns a URI equivalent to this URL. Throws URISyntaxException if the URL is not strictly formatted.

methods.name: toString

returns.description: A string representation of this URL

methods.description: Constructs a string representation of this URL.

methods.name: equals

returns.description: True if the objects are the same URL

methods.description: Compares this URL for equality with another object. Two URLs are equal if they have the same protocol, host, port, and file.

classes.name: HttpURLConnection
classes.description: A URLConnection with support for HTTP-specific features. Used to make HTTP requests and read responses.

methods.name: setRequestMethod

params.name: method
params.description: The HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD, OPTIONS, TRACE)

methods.description: Sets the request method (GET, POST, PUT, etc.).

methods.name: getRequestMethod

returns.description: The HTTP request method

methods.description: Gets the request method.

methods.name: getResponseCode

returns.description: The HTTP status code

methods.description: Gets the HTTP response status code (e.g., 200 for OK, 404 for Not Found).

methods.name: getResponseMessage

returns.description: The HTTP response message (e.g., OK, Not Found)

methods.description: Gets the HTTP response message returned along with the response code.

methods.name: setRequestProperty

params.name: key
params.description: The keyword of the request header (e.g., Content-Type)

params.name: value
params.description: The value of the request header

methods.description: Sets the general request property. If a property with the key already exists, overwrite its value.

methods.name: addRequestProperty

params.name: key
params.description: The keyword of the request header

params.name: value
params.description: The value of the request header

methods.description: Adds a general request property specified by a key-value pair. Does not overwrite existing values.

methods.name: getHeaderField

params.name: name
params.description: The name of a header field

returns.description: The value of the named header field, or null

methods.description: Returns the value of the named header field.

methods.name: getHeaderFields

returns.description: An unmodifiable Map of header fields

methods.description: Returns an unmodifiable Map of the header fields. The Map keys are header names and values are lists of field values.

methods.name: getInputStream

returns.description: An input stream that reads from this connection

methods.description: Returns an input stream that reads from this open connection. Used to read the response body.

methods.name: getErrorStream

returns.description: An error stream, or null if no error

methods.description: Returns the error stream if the connection failed but the server sent useful data (e.g., a 404 page).

methods.name: getOutputStream

returns.description: An output stream that writes to this connection

methods.description: Returns an output stream that writes to this connection. Used to send request body data.

methods.name: disconnect
methods.description: Indicates that other requests to the server are unlikely in the near future. Releases resources.

methods.name: setDoOutput
methods.description: Sets whether this connection allows sending data (output). Must be true for POST/PUT requests.

methods.name: setDoInput
methods.description: Sets whether this connection allows receiving data (input). Defaults to true.

methods.name: setConnectTimeout
methods.description: Sets a specified timeout value, in milliseconds, for opening a connection to the resource.

methods.name: setReadTimeout
methods.description: Sets the read timeout, in milliseconds. A non-zero value specifies the timeout when reading from the input stream.

methods.name: getContentLength

returns.description: The content length, or -1 if not known

methods.description: Returns the value of the content-length header field, or -1 if not known.

methods.name: getContentType

returns.description: The content type of the resource, or null

methods.description: Returns the value of the content-type header field.

methods.name: setInstanceFollowRedirects
methods.description: Sets whether this HttpURLConnection instance should automatically follow HTTP redirects (3xx responses).

methods.name: getURL

returns.description: The URL of this connection

methods.description: Returns the value of this URLConnection's URL field.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Opens a communications link to the resource if such a connection has not already been established.

fields.name: HTTP_INTERNAL_ERROR
fields.description: HTTP status code 500: Internal Server Error.

classes.name: URI
classes.description: Represents a Uniform Resource Identifier (RFC 2396). Provides methods for parsing, normalizing, and resolving URI references.

params.name: str
params.description: The string to be parsed into a URI

constructors.description: Constructs a URI by parsing the given string.
Constructs a hierarchical URI from the given components.

constructors.signature: URI(scheme, userInfo, host, port, path, query, fragment)
constructors.description: Constructs a hierarchical URI from the given components.
Constructs a hierarchical URI from the given components.

methods.name: create

params.name: str
params.description: The string to be parsed into a URI

returns.description: The new URI

methods.description: Creates a URI by parsing the given string. Throws IllegalArgumentException instead of checked URISyntaxException.

methods.name: getScheme

returns.description: The scheme component, or null if undefined

methods.description: Returns the scheme component of this URI.

methods.name: getHost

returns.description: The host component, or null if undefined

methods.description: Returns the host component of this URI.

methods.name: getPort

returns.description: The port component, or -1 if undefined

methods.description: Returns the port component of this URI.

methods.name: getPath

returns.description: The decoded path component, or null

methods.description: Returns the decoded path component of this URI.

methods.name: getQuery

returns.description: The decoded query component, or null

methods.description: Returns the decoded query component of this URI.

methods.name: getFragment

returns.description: The decoded fragment component, or null

methods.description: Returns the decoded fragment component of this URI.

methods.name: getAuthority

returns.description: The decoded authority component, or null

methods.description: Returns the decoded authority component of this URI.

methods.name: getUserInfo

returns.description: The decoded user-information component, or null

methods.description: Returns the decoded user-information component of this URI.

methods.name: getRawPath

returns.description: The raw path component, or null

methods.description: Returns the raw (encoded) path component of this URI.

methods.name: getRawQuery

returns.description: The raw query component, or null

methods.description: Returns the raw (encoded) query component of this URI.

methods.name: resolve

params.name: uri
params.description: The URI to resolve against this URI

returns.description: The resulting URI

methods.description: Resolves the given URI against this URI.

methods.name: resolve

returns.description: The resulting URI

methods.description: Constructs a new URI by parsing the given string and then resolving it against this URI.

methods.name: relativize

params.name: uri
params.description: The URI to relativize against this URI

returns.description: The resulting URI

methods.description: Relativizes the given URI against this URI.

methods.name: normalize

returns.description: A normalized URI equivalent to this URI

methods.description: Normalizes this URI's path by resolving . and .. segments.

methods.name: toURL

returns.description: A URL constructed from this URI

methods.description: Constructs a URL from this URI.

methods.name: isAbsolute

returns.description: True if this URI is absolute (has a scheme)

methods.description: Tells whether or not this URI is absolute (has a scheme component).

methods.name: isOpaque

returns.description: True if this URI is opaque

methods.description: Tells whether or not this URI is opaque (absolute with a scheme-specific part that does not begin with a slash).

methods.name: toString

returns.description: The string form of this URI

methods.description: Returns the content of this URI as a string.

methods.name: toASCIIString

returns.description: The URI as a US-ASCII string

methods.description: Returns the content of this URI as a US-ASCII string, encoding non-ASCII characters.

methods.name: compareTo

returns.description: Negative, zero, or positive value

methods.description: Compares this URI with another URI for ordering.

methods.name: equals

returns.description: True if the given object is equal to this URI

methods.description: Tests this URI for equality with another object.

classes.name: URLEncoder
classes.description: Utility class for HTML form encoding. Translates a string into application/x-www-form-urlencoded format.

methods.name: encode

params.name: enc
params.description: The name of a supported character encoding (e.g., UTF-8)

returns.description: The translated String

methods.description: Translates a string into application/x-www-form-urlencoded format using a specific encoding scheme.

methods.name: encode

returns.description: The translated String

methods.description: Translates a string into application/x-www-form-urlencoded format using the platform's default encoding.

classes.name: URLDecoder
classes.description: Utility class for HTML form decoding. Converts a string from application/x-www-form-urlencoded format.

methods.name: decode

params.name: enc
params.description: The name of a supported character encoding (e.g., UTF-8)

returns.description: The decoded String

methods.description: Decodes an application/x-www-form-urlencoded string using a specific encoding scheme.

methods.name: decode

returns.description: The decoded String

methods.description: Decodes an application/x-www-form-urlencoded string using the platform's default encoding.

classes.name: Socket
classes.description: Implements client sockets (TCP). A socket is an endpoint for communication between two machines.

params.name: host
params.description: The host name or IP address

constructors.description: Creates a stream socket and connects it to the specified port on the named host.
Creates a stream socket and connects it to the specified port at the specified IP address.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Connects this socket to the server.

methods.name: connect

params.name: timeout
params.description: The timeout value in milliseconds (0 means infinite)

methods.description: Connects this socket to the server with a specified timeout value.

methods.name: getInputStream

returns.description: An input stream for reading bytes from this socket

methods.description: Returns an input stream for this socket. Used to receive data.

methods.name: getOutputStream

returns.description: An output stream for writing bytes to this socket

methods.description: Returns an output stream for this socket. Used to send data.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Closes this socket. Any thread currently blocked in an I/O operation on this socket will throw a SocketException.

methods.name: getInetAddress

returns.description: The remote IP address this socket is connected to, or null

methods.description: Returns the address to which the socket is connected.

methods.name: getLocalAddress

returns.description: The local address the socket is bound to

methods.description: Gets the local address to which the socket is bound.

methods.name: getPort

returns.description: The remote port number this socket is connected to

methods.description: Returns the remote port number to which this socket is connected.

methods.name: getLocalPort

returns.description: The local port number this socket is bound to, or -1

methods.description: Returns the local port number to which this socket is bound.

methods.name: setSoTimeout

params.name: timeout
params.description: The timeout in milliseconds (0 means infinite)

methods.description: Enable/disable SO_TIMEOUT with the specified timeout, in milliseconds. A read() call on the InputStream will block for only this amount of time.

methods.name: getSoTimeout

returns.description: The SO_TIMEOUT value

methods.description: Returns setting for SO_TIMEOUT. A value of 0 means the option is disabled (infinite timeout).

methods.name: setKeepAlive
methods.description: Enable/disable SO_KEEPALIVE.

methods.name: setTcpNoDelay

params.name: on
params.description: Whether to enable TCP_NODELAY (disable Nagle's algorithm)

methods.description: Enable/disable TCP_NODELAY (disable/enable Nagle's algorithm).

methods.name: isClosed

returns.description: True if the socket has been closed

methods.description: Returns the closed state of the socket.

methods.name: isConnected

returns.description: True if the socket was successfully connected to a server

methods.description: Returns the connection state of the socket.

methods.name: isBound

returns.description: True if the socket was successfully bound to an address

methods.description: Returns the binding state of the socket.

methods.name: isInputShutdown

returns.description: True if the input of the socket has been shutdown

methods.description: Returns whether the read-half of the socket connection is closed.

methods.name: isOutputShutdown

returns.description: True if the output of the socket has been shutdown

methods.description: Returns whether the write-half of the socket connection is closed.

methods.name: shutdownInput
methods.description: Places the input stream for this socket at end of stream. Any data sent to the input stream side of the socket is acknowledged and silently discarded.

methods.name: shutdownOutput
methods.description: Disables the output stream for this socket. Any previously written data will be sent followed by TCP's normal connection termination sequence.

methods.name: toString

returns.description: A string representation of this socket

methods.description: Converts this socket to a String.
